entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
